ActionPlanTemplateVersion.name: ActionPlanTemplateVersion
ActionPlanTemplateVersion.description: Represents the version of an action plan template.

ActionPlanTemplateId.description: The ID of the action plan template this version represents.

ActivationDateTime.description: The date and time at which this version became active.

InactivationDateTime.description: The date and time at which this version became inactive.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether this action plan template version is locked or not. The default value is false.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether this action plan template version can be edited. The default value is false.

Name.description: The name of this version item.

Status.description: The action plan template versionâ€™s state. Possible values are:

Version.description: The index number of this action plan template version.
